data.client_settings: Desktop client, Release Channel: Canary, Build Number: 9640
data.actual_result: The word or phrase is italicized in quotes, but duplicated.
data.expected_result: The word or phrase is italicized, in quotes.
data.short_description: Removing one asterisk from each side of a quoted bolded word during two edits will duplicate the italicized word
data.steps_to_repro: - Paste a quoted, bolded word or phrase such as [quotation][asterisk][asterisk]Sergals[asterisk][asterisk][quotation] - Remove an asterisk from one side, changing it to [quotation][asterisk][asterisk]Sergals[asterisk][quotation] - Remove an asterisk from the other side, changing it to[quotation][asterisk]Sergals[asterisk][quotation]
